Package Monitors

Class ControlCentreAndWatchingStand

  • java.lang.Object
    • Monitors.ControlCentreAndWatchingStand

  • public class ControlCentreAndWatchingStand
extends java.lang.Object
    The ControlCentreAndWatchingStand class is a monitor that contains all the necessary methods to be used in mutual exclusive access by Broker, Horses and Spectators to itself.

    This is where the broker mostly operates and the spectators watch the race.

    Since:
    2018-03-21
    See Also:
    HorseRace, Broker, HorseAndJockey, Spectator

      static void entertainTheGuests​()

      static void goWatchTheRace​()
      Spectator waits while watching the race.
      static boolean haveIWon​(int horseID)
      Spectator checks if he won his bet.
      static void makeAMove​()
      Horse announces in the ControlCentre that he finished the race.
      static void proceedToPaddock​()
      Horse proceeds to paddock, last horse awakes spectators that are waiting for the horses to enter the paddock.
      static void relaxABit​()
      Last function of Spectator lifecycle.
      static void reportResults​(int[] list)
      Broker declares the horses who won and wakes up the spectators watching the race.
      static void startTheRace​()
      Broker waits for all horse threads to have reached the finish line before proceeding.
      static void summonHorsesToPaddock​()
      Broker waits for all spectator threads to have reached the ControlCentre before proceeding.
      static void waitForNextRace​()
      Spectator waits for next race of the day, last spectator waiting wakes the broker who's ready to start the race.
